radiographic_examinations.findings: Left ventricular ejection fraction of 25%, left ventricular end-diastolic diameter of 6.3 cm, mild mitral regurgitation, mild tricuspid regurgitation.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Ejection fraction unchanged at 25% on echocardiogram 6 months later; however, decreased to 15% at presentation.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Right atrial pressure of 6 mm Hg, pulmonary artery pressure 38/18 mm Hg, pulmonary capillary wedge pressure of 15 mm Hg, cardiac index of 1.9 L/min/m².
Maximal oxygen consumption (V̇O2max) of 10.4 mL/kg/min with a respiratory exchange ratio of 1.1.
